name: Treasure Island (River Software)
overview: A text adventure written in AdventureWriter/Quill. The plot of Treasure Island is simple. It concerns the hunt for buried treasure on an island, appropriately named Treasure Island. Two rival groups are searching for the treasure, one consisting of Long John Silver and the pirates and the other led by Squire Trelawney and Doctor Livesey. You of course play the part of Jim Hawkins, whose parents run the Admiral Benbow Inn. Your father has not been well and your mother has taken him away for a rest cure: leaving you in sole charge of the inn.
